Package org.svvrl.goal.core.util

Class Tree<D>

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.util.Tree<D>
Type Parameters:
D - the type of data contained in this tree
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextTree
public class Tree<D>
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides a generic tree.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Tree()
    Constructs an empty tree.
    Tree​(TreeNode<D> r)
    Constructs this tree with a specified root node.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean containsNode​(TreeNode<D> node)
    Returns true if a specified node is contained in this tree
    int getHeight()
    Returns the height of this tree.
    TreeNode<D> getRoot()
    Returns the root node of this tree.
    java.util.List<TreeNode<D>> levelorder()
    Returns the nodes traversed in a level-order (BFS order).
    java.util.List<TreeNode<D>> postorder()
    Returns the nodes traversed in a post-order.
    java.util.List<TreeNode<D>> preorder()
    Returns the nodes traversed in a pre-order.
    java.util.Set<TreeNode<D>> removeNode​(TreeNode<D> node)
    Removes the subtree rooted by a specified node from this tree.
    void setRoot​(TreeNode<D> r)
    Sets the root node of this tree.
